attributes.action: Free GNER from the £1.3 billion operating charge and allow them to continue to run the Intercity East Coast Franchise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GNER are second to none as train operating companies go. They have been treated unfairly by the government to whom they must pay £1.3billion to run their trains while Virgin are being given the same amount of money to run their services. Save the best Train Operating Company in the UK. Save GNER
